apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, two men are shown holding hands, their skin tones a harmonious blend of light and medium, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and gentle 3D shading. Their clasped hands appear connected and reassuring, with realistic lighting highlighting the subtle curves and warmth of human touch. This emoji, as it appears on Apple devices, beautifully symbolizes friendship, partnership, love, and solidarity, offering a visually inclusive and heartfelt expression.
